title: Effective Mathematics Project Design Strategies in E-Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Focus on strengthening practical math problem-solving skills in collaborative learning environments utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more effective instructional design elements for project-based math problem-solving in an e-learning environment.
Learners can write a practical report analyzing peer learners' e-learning experiences using survey and interview techniques.
Learners can propose specific design strategies for math content that enhance learner engagement in a PBL environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
